item.title: The IT triangle strategy for evaluating enterprise tech startups ...
item.description: IT-Triangle-Technology. There have been plenty of blog posts on why enterprise startups are “hot,” but enterprise startups can range from cloud infrastructure companies to developer software to new enterprise applications. Evaluating each market ... IT-Triangle-Technology. Every computer, data center and even smartphone breaks down into the three main infrastructure components: compute, storage and networking. Overlaying all three corners corners is management and security.
